mapper.insert: insert into operation(id, car, track, challenge, esVersion, pipeline, rally_version, isCluster, node_count, operation, error_rate, unit, min, median, max, flush_time, flush_time_shard, memory_doc_value, memory_norms, memory_segments, memory_stored_field, memory_terms, old_gc_time, young_gc_time, refresh_time, segment_count, total_time, total_time_per_shard, translog_size, merge_throttle_time, merge_throttle_time_per_shard_max, merge_time, merge_time_per_shard_max, trial_timestamp) values (#{id}, #{car}, #{track}, #{challenge}, #{esVersion}, #{pipeline}, #{rally_version}, #{isCluster}, #{node_count}, #{operation}, #{error_rate}, #{unit}, #{min}, #{median}, #{max}, #{flush_time}, #{flush_time_shard}, #{memory_doc_value}, #{memory_norms}, #{memory_segments}, #{memory_stored_field}, #{memory_terms}, #{old_gc_time}, #{young_gc_time}, #{refresh_time}, #{segment_count}, #{total_time}, #{total_time_per_shard}, #{translog_size}, #{merge_throttle_time}, #{merge_throttle_time_per_shard_max}, #{merge_time}, #{merge_time_per_shard_max}, #{trial_timestamp})
